item.title: By: Gail Persily
item.dc:creator: Gail Persily
item.description: I am glad you mentioned that you feel better informed. It's true - now that Slack is being used for a wide range of projects/activities at the Library, it makes it easy to keep up on things I care about, but am not as directly involved in, e.g. Library website and the Summon pilot.
item.content:encoded: I am glad you mentioned that you feel better informed. It’s true – now that Slack is being used for a wide range of projects/activities at the Library, it makes it easy to keep up on things I care about, but am not as directly involved in, e.g. Library website and the Summon pilot.
